paragraph 1: My name is Olga and I am a frontend developer. I'm currently looking for a job in development.
paragraph 2: I specialize in  TypeScript, React, Redux, Next.js, responsive design, etc.
paragraph 2.1: I use low-code platforms nhost/GraphQl/Hasura, Firebase and Node.js in backend.
paragraph 2.4: I have experience communicating with the development team, web designers, and testers.
paragraph 3: In my free time I work on my pet projects. At the moment, I started working on a website project to search for apartments/offices for rent. With this project I began to study Next.js in practice.
paragraph 4: In development, I like to work for the result, I enjoy the work done.
paragraph 4.1: I have a master's degree in Photonics and Optoinformatics, St. Petersburg ITMO University
paragraph 4.2: Skills: HTML,CSS,SCSS, JavaScript, Typescript, React, Hasura(nHost), Firebase, etc.
paragraph 5: 2012, St. Petersburg National Research University of Information Technologies, Mechanics and Optics, St. Petersburg, Photonics and Optical Informatics (Bachelor)
paragraph 6: 2014, St. Petersburg National Research University of Information Technologies, Mechanics and Optics, St. Petersburg, Photonics and Optical Informatics (Master)
paragraph 7: 2022, Yandex Workshop, ANO DPO SHAD, Professional retraining - Profession “Web developer” in the amount of 560 hours.
